entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:46 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -24.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 10:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

Temperature: -24.9°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %

Dewpoint: -27.7°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:04 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:04 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:04 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
